title.bibl: Daily Jewish Courier, June 13, 1919. Jewish Peddlers Form Committee to See Mayor Today

div.bibl: Daily Jewish Courier, June 13, 1919. JEWISH PEDDLERS FORM COMMITTEE TO SEE MAYOR TODAY

body.p: At a well-attended meeting of the Jewish Peddlers Association last night in Netherwoods Hall, members told of their troubles with the Poles, who ridicule them, throw mud and stones, pull them down from their wagons, and beat them. Because of the many complaints that the police were indifferent to these situations, the president, Mr. Ableson, and a committee will visit the Mayor and place these complaints before him.
